name: Hoppy Ball
description:
The greatest hoppy balls of all time have pitted themselves against each other in the arcade grounds to see who can survive and reach the highest score. Take control of your favourite character and hop your way to fame and glory.

 

  • Hop, dodge, and try to survive the hail of photon blasts for as long as you can!
  • Experience hair-raising close calls as you push your reflexes to their limits!
  • Collect coins as you hop to unlock more incredible hoppy ball characters!
  • Compete with friends to reach the highest scores of the leaderboard!

 

Developed and Designed by AndRam Labs

 

*Internet access may be required. This application contains optional video advertisements that can be viewed to provide you additional rewards. Additional data charges may apply if roaming or not connected to Wi-fi.
